title: Infernal demonspawn
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{List of | demonspawn}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Infernal demonspawn''' are demonspawn with a fire-branded melee attack. They can be found in the [[Pandemonium]] or guarding the portals leading to it.

==Tips & Tricks==

At least one level of [[fire resistance]] is definitely recommended, and don't bother using fire attacks on them. They are also vulnerable to holy weapons and [[silver]], so use those if you have them.  Otherwise, treat them like a normal demonspawn.

==History==
*Monstrous, gelid, infernal, and torturous demonspawn were removed in [[0.28]].
*Infernal demonspawn were added in [[0.14]].
